DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study observe patient satisfaction BOTOX® Cosmetic treatment glabellar rhytides ( frown line ) use new treatment satisfaction measure .
DOC.brief_title: Patient Satisfaction Study BOTOX® Cosmetic Treatment Moderate Severe Frown Lines
DOC.criteria: Moderate severe glabellar wrinkle ( frown line ) Previous treatment botulinum toxin therapy serotype Facial nonablative resurface laser light treatment , microdermabrasion , superficial peel within 3 month Any facial cosmetic procedure medium depth deep facial chemical peel ( e.g. , trichloroacetic acid phenol ) , midfacial periorbital laser skin resurface permanent makeup within 6 month Midfacial periorbital treatment nonpermanent soft tissue filler Subjects plan facial cosmetic procedure visible scar Previous cosmetic surgery upper face ( e.g. , prior periorbital surgery , facial lift , brow lift , eyelid lift eyebrow surgery ) Diagnoses Myasthenia Gravis , EatonLambert Syndrome , Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis History facial nerve palsy A plan extend absence study
